20101201035116.000|20101201035118.000|CCO|ATHLETE.

20101201035120.000|20101201035122.000|CCO|STARTING QUARTERBACK FOR THE 
20101201035122.000|20101201035124.500|CCO|UCLA BRUINS IN 1972 AND 1973.

20101201035127.000|20101201035129.500|CCO|UCLA IN 1974.
20101201035129.500|20101201035132.000|CCO|HE CONSIDERED ADVERTISING, BUT 
20101201035132.000|20101201035133.667|CCO|HE DECIDED ON ACTING.
